name: 欢迎加入奇趣社
description:
Summary

Welcome to Qiqu Club is a long visual novel created by Dream Cracker, telling a campus story based on modern Chinese society. If you long for adventures in normal life, or confused and scared about the future of yourself, then this game may be suitable for you.

Intro

Le Yang, a university student with bad grades, was facing the fate of dropping out because of several failed exams. In desperation, he called a number written on washroom door left by paid test-taker, hoping he can get help. However, the person answered the call is from a mysterious school club. So the story starts...

Game features

· This game has nearly 1.4 million words, divided into 3 branches. Each branch is a distinctive part (But because of limitation of budget, we can only publish 1 of the 3 branches for the first step, which is the main branch). In addition, we don’t use free material library. Besides of a small amout of paid canned music, all the arts and music used in game are original designed. All characters have Chinese dubbing. All this above takes a lot out of us.

· This game has a compact plot. Wo don’t provide lengthy daily conversations.
· Although there is quite a few proportion of love plots in this game, we don’t use “girls” element as main theme or confine our players to a specific gender. We believe that everyone can find what they want in this game as long as you yearn for a beautiful affection.
· This game aims to telling real Chinese modern story and exploring the way forward of Chinese visual novel. We believe that if we want to develop and grow, we must secede from Japanese Crap completely. We will make every effort to achieve this goal.
